featured.text: I __________ accept your plan, but I think it should be somewhat reworded.

definition.zh_def: 重新表達或改寫某個詞語或句子，以使其更清晰或更具吸引力。
definition.en_def: To express something in different words, often to clarify or enhance its appeal.
definition.example: Can you reword this sentence to make it easier to understand?
